markdown:
<title level="1" right="Action">[Change Tradition Focus](/Actions.aspx?ID=475) <actions string="Single Action" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 167

**Requirements** You are in a duel and are trained in the skill for the tradition you’re changing your focus to (Arcana for arcane, Occultism for occult, Nature for primal, or Religion for divine).

</column>

---

You change your tradition focus to another magical tradition.
name: Change Tradition Focus
requirement: You are in a duel and are trained in the skill for the tradition you’re changing your focus to (Arcana for arcane, Occultism for occult, Nature for primal, or Religion for divine).
